alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 07 at 7:07PM MDT until June 07 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 815 PM MDT. * At 707 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located 13 miles south of Lamar, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Prowers County. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
